```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(CATkit)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
filePath <- 'C:/Users/yanru/Downloads/skin_temp/data'
fileName <- file.path(filePath, 'heart_rate.txt')
```

```{r}
skin_temp_data <- read.table(fileName, sep = ',', header = TRUE)
print(skin_temp_data)
```

```{r}
CatCall(TimeCol=c(1), timeFormat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S",lum=NA, 
        valCols=2, sumCols=c(), Avg=FALSE, export=TRUE, sizePts=1, binPts=30, 
        Interval = 0, Increment=0, k=5, yLab=NA, modulo=1440, Rverbose=0, RmaxGap=3000, 
        Skip=0, header=TRUE, Smoothing=TRUE, Actogram=TRUE, AutoCorr=TRUE, 
        CrossCorr=FALSE,Console=FALSE,Graphics="pdf", Darkness=0, LagPcnt=1,
        fileName=fileName)
```
